channel.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
channel.description:
Rumor has it that in exactly two months time BMS will be released in march!
So who here is going to make the BMS Co-op mod? How is it going to be presented to the community?

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: Slowpokes_Bro
item.description:
Sure does. I think just simply saying the rumors were false would have been good. Granted there’d be more rage but It’d die out real quick.

Read full topic
item.source: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Lets clear up the 2 month thing for ya…

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=320307#post320307

CatzEyes93 24-12-10:

Breaking news folks…

I am sorry but do not expect the game to come out within the next two months.

That is all. :wipes the tears from her eyes:

I stand by that statement, but lets clarify something. The only reason I said that was because due to someone mentioning something might happen at the end of the year, there was a big stir happening throughout the forum. MY statement is only saying what NOT to expect. It is not saying what WILL happen or at what time.

Does that help?

Read full topic
item.source: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
NOOB!

nah, just kidding, but i hate it when people like the OP take stuff a developer says, like when catz said “don’t expect anything from the mod in the next two months” and turns it into “HOLY SHIT THE MOD IS GONNA BE RELEASED IN TWO MONTHS!”

Read full topic

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: Slowpokes_Bro
item.description:
The perfect example of a newbie joining the forums and asking questions about things that are already known. (Not implying that I’m not a newbie, but I lurked the forums for a year before joinging).

Also before anyone rages at me, I’m not saying I’m a regular in anyway, just pointing this out. Feel free to call me a noob for making this post.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: xsantosis
item.description:
Shortstuff910mc:

Rumor has it that in exactly two months time BMS will be released in march!

So who here is going to make the BMS Co-op mod? How is it going to be presented to the community?

The Hazard Course won’t be featured in Black Mesa, but the community fans started their own project of a Hazard Course in Source Engine

Look the project: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=4543&highlight=hazard

Read full topic
item.source: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
blatstuff:

the rumor of 2 months until release was started by people who read things but don’t comprehend them.
Raminator recently stated that the mod would NOT be released anytime within the next two months.

OMG, It burns!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: blatstuff
item.description:
the rumor of 2 months until release was started by people who read things but don’t comprehend them. Raminator recently stated that the mod would NOT be released anytime within the next two months. That didn’t state that the mod would be released after that time, simply that it wouldn’t be released before then. People who can’t comprehend that have taken it to mean a release date of late Feb or early March.

Read full topic
item.source: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: Hris
item.description:
mgmartin:

To be honest, I find it hard to see how a Co-op mode would make the game better in any way.
Of course, Co-op is a lot of fun in other games like Gears of War, Halo, and so on, but really… “half life 1- coop” ?

Anyone wanna explain how this would work?

This is one of the things I’ve really been wondering about while beeing unable to ask due to closed registrations.

One person plays Gordon Freeman and the other people in the COOP server play security guards. I suppose

Read full topic
item.source: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?

Of course, Co-op is a lot of fun in other games like Gears of War, Halo, and so on, but really… “half life 1- coop” ?

Anyone wanna explain how this would work?

This is one of the things I’ve really been wondering about while beeing unable to ask due to closed registrations.

item.title: Who is making BMS Co-op mod?
item.dc:creator: Shortstuff910mc
item.description:
LimitBreak:

Nope. Singleplayer for now.

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=173974&postcount=6786

I understand that BMS dev team has canceled the Co-op as it was too much to handle. They did mention that other people might be making the Co-op mod.
